articles.summary: New Zealand beat Sri Lanka by 61 runs to knock the co-hosts out of the T20 World Cup and boost their own semi-final hopes.
articles.one_line: New Zealand dump hosts Sri Lanka out of T20 World Cup

articles.title: Chip giant Nvidia defies AI concerns with record $215bn revenue
articles.summary: Demand for Nvidia chips rose even as the company sets out to create AI products of its own.
articles.one_line: Chip giant Nvidia defies AI concerns with record $215bn revenue
